segments.text: The girl is so innocent, just waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t realize how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her brother is going to drop that plate if he’s not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he gives her a cookie before he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is getting everywhere, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just turn off the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR
